archimate:Contract.name: [Policy] Retention of L1 Files within the Data Backbone (Contract)
archimate:Contract.documentation:
The policy implements the DPDD for 30 day retention.
Some have noticed that these PVI's are the only processed images available until annual release. and should be retrined unt an PVI is supplanted via an annual release. The thinking anto include some oft exposgures/images will never be processed in an annul realase becasue the exposures fail to ett quality cuts. such PVIs would be retained for the life of the survey.
